title: Cannot build

labels.name: frozen-due-to-age
labels.description: Issues closed and untouched for a long time, together with being locked for discussion

body:
```
Audrius@Audrius syncthing $ git reset --hard HEAD
HEAD is now at 84eb729 Don't start the browser on restarts (fixes #636)

Audrius@Audrius syncthing $ ./build.sh
godep go install -ldflags -w -X main.Version v0.9.9+62-g84eb729 -X main.BuildStamp 1409981730 -X main.BuildUser Audrius\Audrius -X main.BuildHost AUDRIUS -X main.BuildEnv default ./cmd/...
# github.com/syncthing/syncthing/cmd/stindex
cmd\stindex\main.go:15: inconsistent definition for type opt.Options during import
        struct { AltFilters []filter.Filter; BlockCache cache.Cache; BlockRestartInterval int; BlockSize int; Comparer comparer.Comparer; Compression opt.Compression; ErrorIfExist bool; ErrorIfMissing bool; Filter filter.Filter; MaxOpenFiles int; Strict opt.Strict; WriteBuffer int } (in "github.com/syncthing/syncthing/files")
        struct { AltFilters []filter.Filter; BlockCache cache.Cache; BlockRestartInterval int; BlockSize int; CachedOpenFiles int; Comparer comparer.Comparer; Compression opt.Compression; ErrorIfExist bool; ErrorIfMissing bool; Filter filter.Filter; Strict opt.Strict; WriteBuffer int } (in "github.com/syndtr/goleveldb/leveldb")
# github.com/syncthing/syncthing/model
model\model.go:26: inconsistent definition for type opt.Options during import
        struct { AltFilters []filter.Filter; BlockCache cache.Cache; BlockRestartInterval int; BlockSize int; Comparer comparer.Comparer; Compression opt.Compression; ErrorIfExist bool; ErrorIfMissing bool; Filter filter.Filter; MaxOpenFiles int; Strict opt.Strict; WriteBuffer int } (in "github.com/syncthing/syncthing/files")
        struct { AltFilters []filter.Filter; BlockCache cache.Cache; BlockRestartInterval int; BlockSize int; CachedOpenFiles int; Comparer comparer.Comparer; Compression opt.Compression; ErrorIfExist bool; ErrorIfMissing bool; Filter filter.Filter; Strict opt.Strict; WriteBuffer int } (in "github.com/syncthing/syncthing/stats")
model\model.go:27: inconsistent definition for type opt.Options during import
        struct { AltFilters []filter.Filter; BlockCache cache.Cache; BlockRestartInterval int; BlockSize int; Comparer comparer.Comparer; Compression opt.Compression; ErrorIfExist bool; ErrorIfMissing bool; Filter filter.Filter; MaxOpenFiles int; Strict opt.Strict; WriteBuffer int } (in "github.com/syncthing/syncthing/files")
        struct { AltFilters []filter.Filter; BlockCache cache.Cache; BlockRestartInterval int; BlockSize int; CachedOpenFiles int; Comparer comparer.Comparer; Compression opt.Compression; ErrorIfExist bool; ErrorIfMissing bool; Filter filter.Filter; Strict opt.Strict; WriteBuffer int } (in "github.com/syndtr/goleveldb/leveldb")
godep: go exit status 2
exit status 1
exit status 1
```

Also, zapped the deps expecting the build wrapper to re-pull them for me, but it seems it doesn't do that.
Repulled via IDE:

Then rebuilding deps:

```
Audrius@Audrius syncthing $ ./build.sh deps
rm -r Godeps
godep save ./cmd/...
godep: dirty working tree: C:\Go\bin\src\github.com\bkaradzic\go-lz4
godep: dirty working tree: C:\Go\bin\src\github.com\calmh\xdr
godep: dirty working tree: C:\Go\bin\src\github.com\juju\ratelimit

exit status 1

And ofcourse building doesn't work:

```
Audrius@Audrius syncthing $ ./build.sh
godep go install -ldflags -w -X main.Version v0.9.9+62-g84eb729-dirty -X main.BuildStamp 1409981730 -X main.BuildUser Audrius\Audrius -X main.BuildHost AUDRIUS -X main.BuildEnv default ./cmd/...
